description: As a Data Scientist, your role involves close collaboration with product design and engineering teams to understand their needs. You will conduct research, devising innovative statistical models for data analysis, and subsequently build and integrate these models into our products. Effective communication of your findings to all stakeholders is crucial, contributing directly to decision-making processes. Additionally, your commitment to staying current with technical and industry developments is essential to ensuring ongoing innovation. If you are passionate about data analysis, enjoy collaboration, and thrive on contributing to product enhancement, we invite you to join our team where your insights will play a key role in shaping our products and processes.
qualification:
Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in statistics, technology, applied mathematics, or related discipline.
Professional certification
3-5 years of experience in data science
Proficiency with data mining, mathematics, and statistical analysis
Advanced experience in pattern recognition and predictive modeling
Experience with Excel, PowerPoint, SQL, and Python
Experience in building data science models using Spacy, BERT, Ahocorasick, random forest etc.
Ability to work effectively in a dynamic, research-oriented group that has several concurrent projects.

description:
Our client is seeking a highly motivated and experienced Senior Data Scientist to join our growing team and play a key role in developing and deploying machine learning models to support their platform. 

The candidate needs to possess deep expertise in data science methodologies, machine learning, and natural language processing, and will have a proven track record of successfully training and deploying models, in particular large language models (LLMs), to production. 

Also, will also be able to effectively communicate your findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Strong programming skills in Python
Experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
Excellent communication skills

description: We are seeking a dedicated and experienced Software Developer to join our dynamic team. description:
As a member of the global data engineering team, reporting to the Data and Analytics Manager, this role has a primary focus on contributing to our enterprise data warehousing and reporting deliverables.


Responsibilities include designing, creating, and maintaining business intelligence assets and reports that drive innovation, client value and business efficiency.


This position will be working across our largest business units and experience with multi-terabyte database systems is required.
qualification:
Experienced level knowledge - Business Intelligence/reporting tools including Microsoft SQL, SRSS, SSIS, SSAS, Power BI, DAX.
Adept at designing and implementing effective data models and Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes slowly changing dimensions for transforming and loading data into the data warehouse.
Experience incorporating data from varied relational systems (e.g. MySQL, Postgres etc), flat-file, API, and No-SQL sources.
Understanding of data governance practices, data lineage, and data quality management to ensure accurate, consistent, and reliable data.
Familiarity with cloud base tooling – Snowflake, DBT or Coalesce, Fivetran.
BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
